title: Solitude of Stars
description: Separated by language, culture, and success from the guitarist whose music she loves, Ariane has no hope of ever meeting him in person. But this obsession fuels her curiosity in all things Japanese, she starts learning the language, and makes an on-line friend on the other side of the globe.Her long awaited holiday in Japan is about to become even more exciting when she meets her friend in person, and he offers to introduce her to the real man behind the carefully crafted image she admired for so long. On one condition.
author: Demi R. Idle
